item.title: Create a custom 'Residents' card in your Home Assistant's dashboard
item.description: Shortly after I released my latest post, a friend DM’ed me on Twitter and asked about my residents card that I showcased briefly, so it gave the perfect opportunity on making a post about it and share with the world this card that I enjoy so much. It’s pretty easy and it’s mostly vanilla Home Assistant/Lovelace so put your mad scientist lab coats, hop aboard and let’s learn how to make awesome display cards.
